# Settlement of ETH
This document presents the recommended steps in order to settle the Nahmii 1
balance of NII of account `0x5346a38F7C6d8c2253bBC6A55ef6A99Dc284dd26`.

The ordered steps of contract function invocations are included below and in
the corresponding [steps.json](./steps.json). Please read [the general recipe
for settling Nahmii 1 balance](../../README.md) before starting on the first
step of settlement.

## Ordered steps
### Step 1
#### Contract
*DriipSettlementChallengeByPayment* ([0x906fd331f5e382f05b8ae26900140c37f0db139a](https://etherscan.io/address/0x906fd331f5e382f05b8ae26900140c37f0db139a))
#### Method name
*startChallengeFromPayment*
#### Method payload
```

```
#### Encode method args
* *payment*: 
```
{
  "seals": {
    "wallet": {
      "hash": "0x6deae503c164be0b381552b12ed7d94d675da7a06704f32b7146276ba4cf8392",
      "signature": {
        "s": "0x2604bedcdeb0fbdf49fa393b958252f7b88cabd4d29409941983c08fc9257707",
        "r": "0x2863bd1127b714050d953bee74c3d2f914c67dab7c6fe65406e5eae499d2f11e",
        "v": 27

    },

      "hash": "0x4285cd2cb78f9b4cc40a8ced36c8a314f4fdf8a8ff234d05a603aaa0b716a57c",

        "r": "0x4c4fea1dabab04301727eb773a543ef129d2acea48b25875ab283aae79c8917c",
```

### Step 2
#### Contract

#### Method payload
```

```
